title: Behind The Idea #40: Better Than Beer? Revisiting Canopy Growth Corporation With Darren McCammon
description:
It takes creativity to invest in pot stocks at this stage. Valuation isn't there, so you have to imagine the growth ahead, think about how to identify a winner that not everyone else has, and prepare for the ups and downs that are sure to come.

We talk with Darren McCammon, who has already been investing in the industry for several years - including in ebbu, Canopy Growth Corporation's latest purchase - about Canopy and the marijuana industry as a whole.
itunes:title: Better Than Beer? Revisiting Canopy Growth Corporation With Darren McCammon
itunes:author: Seeking Alpha
itunes:subtitle: We talk to an early-stage investor in pot companies about the road ahead for the industry
